conclusion: Preliminary objection dismissed (non-exhaustion);Violation of Art. 3 as regards treatment on arrest;No violation of Art. 3 as regards treatment during detention;Violation of Art. 5-4;Violation of Art. 5-5;Violation of Art. 8;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award

issue: Code of Criminal Procedure, sections 211(3), 542(1) ;   Constitution, Article 26
